title: What does the activity reminder feature do?
answer: In the Huawei Wear application, you can configure the activity reminder interval, start time, end time, and repeats. Once configured, your TalkBand B2 will check whether you have been active during the specified period. If you haven't been active, your TalkBand B2 will remind you to exercise and keep fit.
faqType: Alarms, Notifications, Alerts, and Push Messages
